"%1$s is requesting to upload a bug report from this device taken on %2$s at %3$s. Bug reports include personal information about your device or logged by apps, for example, user names, location data, device identifiers, and network information. Only share bug reports with people and apps you trust with this information.
Allow %4$s to upload a bug report?"
